question: Is it permissible for men to use alcohol containing body spray such as Adidas and whether the salat will be properly performed of such men using such an alcohol containing body spray?
answer:
QUESTION

Is it permissible for men to use alcohol containing body spray such as Adidas and whether the salat will be properly performed of such men using such an alcohol containing body spray?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

The alcohol in sprays and perfumes is synthetic and pure.

Salah performed with such sprays on the clothing and body will be valid.     

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
